https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zdjLTyL40dNwhwPucHCLf82yOO2.jpg Single mom Emma Sanderson is looking for a Christmas miracle to write about for the lifestyle magazine where she's landed a temporary job. Along the way Emma discovers unexpected romance with a supportive colleague and brings about a Christmas miracle for a lonely street musician. A Christmas Miracle
